creator: self.4spam@gmail.com
text: In org.apache.poi.hslf.model.Background#draw only solid color and picture types of background are implemented. ppt's with different background types are converting incorrectly.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: The class was heavily modified and refactored into sub-classes for HSLF and XSLF in the meantime, therefore I am closing this as WONTFIX, please reopen if this is still a problem for you.
